snippet: Newt Gingrich delivers on a promise, releasing a Web video called "Taxman," accusing Mitt Romney of raising $700 million worth of taxes while governor of Massachusetts.
abstract: Newt Gingrich delivers on a promise, releasing a Web video called "Taxman," accusing Mitt Romney of raising $700 million worth of taxes while governor of Massachusetts.
lead_paragraph: 3:03 p.m. | Updated MANCHESTER, N.H. -- Newt Gingrich on Monday delivered on a promise he had made a day earlier, releasing a Web video called "Taxman," accusingMitt Romney of raising $700 million worth of taxes while governor of Massachusetts.

headline.main: Gingrich Video Criticizes Romney on Taxes
